metadata.description: Meet the Trinity Angels! When Maria, Teresa and Gianna Barbella awake mysteriously in the woods, they find their entire lives turned upside down. Suddenly scantily clad and endowed with powerful assets, our heroines must battle the villany of Head-Butt and his strange henchmen. Follow the exploits of the Trinity Angels, a titillating send-up of the mid-90's Bad Girl comic craze.
metadata.name: Trinity Angels
